## Overview

In this lesson, you will learn the basic concepts of network data model and network analysis methods. You will also gain hands-on experience on using QGIS to build network data models and to perform shortest path analysis.

## Content

-   Why analyse with network?
-   Network model
-   Real world network system
-   Complexity of urban road network
-   Shortest path analysis algorithm
-   Delineating network service area
